channel.title: The Disco’s been a bit quiet lately
channel.description:
Hello! Sorry to bother you, but I’ve been thinking... the old notification for the Disco in the in-app news for Auxy is long gone. It seems like there are tons of people regularly using Auxy, but nothing is bringing new people into the community.
So I was thinking, why not a little news notification? It would probably bring us new people, and even fill up @DHO’s tournament bracket a bit!

item.title: The Disco’s been a bit quiet lately
item.dc:creator: BobTheGUYYYYY
item.description:
Yeah, it’s there, but it’s pretty hidden away. The neon green box is much more likely to draw in new members.

Read full topic
item.source: The Disco’s been a bit quiet lately

item.title: The Disco’s been a bit quiet lately
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I mean, this is still here.

I do think I remember there being something in the feed about it ages ago but this section of how to I think has always had it

Read full topic
item.source: The Disco’s been a bit quiet lately
